mapper.select: select * from keyword_data where keyword = #{keyword} limit 0, 1
mapper.update: update keyword_data set user_idx = #{user_idx}, keyword_type = #{keyword_type}, keyword_property = #{keyword_property}, keyword = #{keyword}, updateDate = now() where keyword_idx = #{keyword_idx}

update keyword_data set keyword_property='포함0' where keyword_main = #{keyword_main} and keyword_property='포함';
